definitions.text: the act of apprehending (especially apprehending a criminal)
examples: the policeman on the beat got credit for the collar

definitions.text: the state of inactivity following an interruption
examples: during the halt he got some lunch
the momentary stay enabled him to escape the blow
he spent the entire stop in his seat
the police nabbed the suspected criminals

definitions.text: hold back, as of a danger or an enemy; check the expansion or influence of
examples: Check the growth of communism in South East Asia
Turn back the tide of communism
Catch the attention of the waiter
